Title: Credential stuffing / account takeover
Mitigation: Rate limit, MFA for risky logins, lockout, bot detection

Title: Injection in API query
Mitigation: Parameterized queries/ORM, input validation, least-priv DB role

Title: S3 public access / overbroad IAM
OWASP_2021: A05 Security Misconfiguration; A02 Cryptographic Failures
Mitigation: Block public access, least privilege IAM, encryption, short TTL presigned URLs

Title: Insufficient logging & monitoring
OWASP_2021: A09 Security Logging and Monitoring Failures
Mitigation: Structured logs, correlation IDs, CloudTrail, alerts
